info.name: Basis Registratie Personen
info.description:
API Details
- Component: Basis Registratie Personen
- Reference: brp
- Enviroment: dev
- Version: V.0.1
- Repository: [online](https://github.com/ConductionNL/brpservice) / [zip](https://github.com/ConductionNL/brpservice/archive/master.zip)
- Docker Image: [online](https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/conduction/brp-php) 
- Datamodel: [postman](/schema/brp.postman_collection.json) / [oas](/schema/openapi.yaml) / [pdf](/schema/datamodel.pdf) / [modelio (zip)](/schema/Datamodel_Modelio.zip) 

'Naast deze JSON rest API is er ook een [graphql](/graphql) interface beschikbaar.'
